name: 陳靜儀
objective:
設計科學研究重視創造與解決現實世界問題相關且實用的成品或服務。目標是開發具有實用價值並可在實務中實施的解決方案或進一步進行設計驗證。課堂進行方式，除了方法講解，將於課堂採用方法卡與結構化的課堂互動模式，深化學生對設計學在學術研究方法的認識與應用。學生將學會：
1. 理解設計學的範疇與趨勢
2. 理解如何擬定研究命題與設計研究方法
3. 理解量化與質性研究方法
4. 理解研究結果的詮釋與視覺化
5. 擬定研究命題、研究框架、研究流程與方法
Design science research values the creation of finished products or service that are relevant and useful in solving real-world problems. The goal is to develop solutions that have practical value and can be implemented in practice or for further design verification. In addition to method explanations, method cards and a structured classroom interaction mode will be used in class to deepen students' understanding and application of design methods in academic research. Students will learn:
1.Understand the scope and trends of design
2.Understand how to formulate research propositions and design research methods
3.Understand quantitative and qualitative research methods
4.Understand the interpretation and visualization of research results
5.Formulate research propositions, research framework, research processes and methods
